content.text: Match ends, Nice 3, Vitesse 0.
Second Half ends, Nice 3, Vitesse 0.

Corner,  Nice. Conceded by Milot Rashica.
Attempt blocked. Navarone Foor (Vitesse) left footed shot from outside the box is blocked.

Milot Rashica (Vitesse) wins a free kick on the right wing.
Goal!  Nice 3, Vitesse 0. Alassane Pléa (Nice) right footed shot from the right side of the box to the bottom right corner. Assisted by Bassem Srarfi.
Substitution, Nice. Bassem Srarfi replaces Allan Saint-Maximin.
Offside, Vitesse. Navarone Foor tries a through ball, but Tim Matavz is caught offside.
Substitution, Vitesse. Mukhtar Ali replaces Thulani Serero.
Delay over. They are ready to continue.
